definition[0]: a system of organization in which people or things are divided into levels of importance
example[1]: She worked her way up through the corporate hierarchy to become president.
definition[1]: the most important and powerful members of an organization
definition[2]: an organization or structure in which the staff are organized in levels and the people at one level have authority over those below them
example[3]: Many companies have restructured theirorganizational hierarchies.
example[4]: the key men in the company hierarchy
definition[3]: a structure in which files, information etc are organized in levels, each one being reached from the previous one
example[5]: Each disk is divided into a hierarchy of directories.
